data.name: Samsung Gallery
data.description:
Samsung Gallery will allow you to view images and watch video files stored on your phone. It supports 2D and 3D video, 3D spacial sound, subtitles, and photo galleries. 

The following permissions are required for the app service. For optional permissions, the default functionality of the service is turned on, but not allowed. 

[Required permissions] 
- Storage : Purpose of accessing images and videos stored in storage

changelog.change_log:
v2.5.17
• Improved 180° view mode playback shape

v2.5.16
• Reworked UI to improve visual quality
• Add new Filter Effect for images (except for video cover and external medias)
• Add new Handheld Menu for Gear VR Controller - just long press trigger button when viewing any media
• Add Sort By menu for Albums
• Add 2x/1x stretch feature for full-sized 3D videos
• Improved quality and stability

v2.5.17
• Improved 180° view mode playback shape

v2.5.16
• Reworked UI to improve visual quality
• Add new Filter Effect for images (except for video cover and external medias)
• Add new Handheld Menu for Gear VR Controller - just long press trigger button when viewing any media
• Add Sort By menu for Albums
• Add 2x/1x stretch feature for full-sized 3D videos
• Improved quality and stability

• Reworked UI to improve visual quality
• Add new Filter Effect for images (except for video cover and external
medias)
• Add new Handheld Menu for Gear VR Controller - just long press trigger
button when viewing any media
• Add Sort By menu for Albums
• Add 2x/1x stretch feature for full-sized 3D videos
• Now, 3D effect is only applied when all menus are hidden to avoid any
visualization issue
• Improved quality and stability

- VR optimized zoom
   Users can zoom in/out and pan more effectively by adding a mini-map.
- Upgraded slideshow transition effects
   Enjoy intriguing VR-optimized transitions during slide shows.

- Support GearVR Controller
- Support USB Storage
- Support Related Contents
